1066:1: atrāha - yadi kleśāḥ karmāṇi ca dehāśca kartāraśca phalāni ca sarvametanna tattvam,
1066:2: kevalaṃtu gandharvanagarādivadattatvameva sat tattvākāreṇa pratibhāsate bālānām ,
1066:5: ādhyātmikabāhyāśeṣavastvanupalambhena adhyātmaṃ bahiśca yaḥ sarvathā ahaṃkāramamakāraparikṣayaḥ,
1066:13: kāyadṛṣṭimūlakameva saṃsāramanupaśyan ātmānu palambhācca satkāyadṛṣṭiprahāṇaṃ tatprahāṇācca sarvakleśavyāvṛttiṃ samanupaśyan prathamataramātmānamevopaparīkṣate,
1066:16: sa cāyamahaṃkārasya viṣayaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ skandhasvabhāvo vā bhavetskandhavyatirikto vā?
1066:17: ādhārādheyatadvatpakṣāṇāmapi ekatvānyatvapakṣe eva antarbhāvāt saṃkṣepeṇaiva ca vivakṣitatvādekatvānyatvapakṣadvayapratiṣedhenaiva ātmaniṣedhamārabdhukāma ācārya āha -
1066:20: kimartha punaranyatra tathāgataparīkṣāyāmagnīndhanaparīkṣāyāṃ ca pañca pañca pakṣā upanyastāḥ,
1066:22: yenaiva tatra prakaraṇadvaye pañca pañca pakṣā nirdiṣṭāḥ,
1066:23: ata eva anyatra nirdiṣṭatvānna punariha nirdiśyante |
1066:26: tadā udayavyayabhāg utpādī ca vināśī ca ātmā prāpnoti,
1066:39: dravye vṛttau vaiparītye ca na syāt ||
1066:44: ityādinā madhyamakāvatāre vistareṇa vihitavicārādapi pakṣo boddhavya iti neha punarvistaraprapañca ārabhyate ||
1066:45: evaṃ tāvat skandhā ātmā na bhavati |
1066:49: yathā hi goranyo'śvaḥ na golakṣaṇe bhavati,
1066:52: tatra askandhalakṣaṇa ātmā bhavan bhavanmatena utpādasthitibhaṅgalakṣaṇāyuktaḥ syāt |
1066:54: saḥ avidyamānatvādasaṃskṛtatvādvā khapuṣpavannirvāṇabadvā naiva ātmavyapadeśaṃ pratilabhate,
1066:57: athavā | ayamanyo'rthaḥ - yadi ātmā skandhavyatiriktaḥ syāt,
1066:60: ātmā ca rūpādiva vijñānaṃ skandhebhyo vyatirikta iṣyamāṇaḥ pṛthaglakṣaṇasiddhaḥ syāt,
1066:64: nanu ca tīrthikāḥ skandhebhyo vyatiriktamātmānaṃ pratipannā bhinnalakṣaṇamācakṣate,
1066:66: yathā ca tīrthikā ātmano bhinnalakṣaṇamācakṣate tathoktaṃ madhyamakāvatāre -
1066:73: na punaste svarūpata ātmānamupalabhya tasya lakṣaṇamācakṣate,
1066:74: kiṃ tarhi yathāvadupādāyaprajñaptyanavagamena nāmamātrakamevātmānaṃ trāsādapratipadyamānāḥ saṃvṛtisatyādapi paribhraṣṭā mithyākalpanayaiva kevalamanumānābhāsamātravipralabdhāḥ santaḥ mohāt parikalpayanti ātmānam,
1066:76: teṣāṃ ca karmakārakaparīkṣādiṣu ātmopādānayoḥ parasparāpekṣikīṃ siddhiṃ bruvatā saṃvṛtyāpi pratiṣedho vihita eva | uktaṃ ca -
1066:78: dṛśyate nāma taccaiva na kiṃcidapi tattvataḥ ||
1066:86: upādāya prajñapyamāna eva avidyāviparyāsānu gatānāmātmābhiniveśāspadabhūto mumukṣubhirvicāryate,
1066:87: yasyedaṃ skandhapañcakamupādānatvena pratibhāsate kimasau skandhalakṣaṇaḥ uta askandhalakṣaṇaḥ iti |
1066:88: sarvathā ca vicārayanto mumukṣavo nainamupalabhante bhāvasvabhāvataḥ | tadā eṣām -
1066:91: yathaiva hi dagdhe rathe tadaṅgānyapi dagdhatvānnopalabhyante,
1066:96: bījaṃ yasyānṛtaṃ tasya prarohaḥ satyataḥ kutaḥ ||
1066:99: yathaiva hi grīṣme madhyāhnakālāvasānamāsāditasya vidhananabhomadhyadeśamācikraṃso rīṣatparibhramyamānapaṭutarahutabhugvitatasphuliṅgāniva virūkṣataramahīmaṇḍalottāpanaparān pradīptakiraṇasya kiraṇān pratītya virūkṣataramavanideśaṃ cāsādya viparītaṃ ca darśanamapekṣya salilākārā marīcaya upalabhyamānā vidūradeśāvasthitānāṃ janmavatāmatiprasannābhinīlajalākāraṃ pratyayamādadhati na tu tatsamīpagatānām,
1066:100: evamihāpi yathāvasthitātmātmīyapadārthatattvadarśanavidūradeśāntarasthitānāṃ saṃsārādhvani vartamānānāmavidyāviparyāsānugamānmṛṣārtha eva skandhasamāropaḥ satyataḥ pratibhāsamānaḥ padārthatattvadarśanasamīpasthānāṃ na pratibhāsate |
1066:103: marīciryadi vāri syādāsannaiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate ||
1066:108: ata eva ca ātmātmīyānupalambhātparamārthadarśanasamīpastho yogī niyataṃ bhavati -
1066:113: ātmano'haṃkāraviṣayasya ātmanīnasya ca skandhādervastunaḥ mamakāraviṣayasya śamādanutpādādanupalambhānnirmamo nirahaṃkāraśca jāyate yogī ||2||
1066:114: nanu ca yo'sāvevaṃ nirmamo nirahaṃkāraśca yogī bhavati,
1066:116: sati ca tasmin siddha ātmā skandhāśceti naitadevam | yasmāt -
1066:117: nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaśca so'pi na vidyate |
1066:118: nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ yaḥ paśyati na paśyati ||3||
1066:119: ātmani skandheṣu ca sarvathānupalabhyamānasvarūpeṣu kutastadvayatirikto'parapadārtho bhaviṣyati yo'sau nirmamo nirahaṃkāraśceti |
1066:120: yastu evamasaṃvidyamānasvarūpaṃ nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ ca paśyati,
1066:124: na vidyate so'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatām ||
1066:131: so'pi ca cittu na jātu na bhūtaḥ |
1066:143: satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭisamudayāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭihetukāḥ sarvakleśāḥ sūtre uktāḥ |
1066:147: yataśca ayaṃ janmanivṛttikramaḥ evaṃ vyavasthāpitaḥ, tasmāt -
1066:150: upādāne hi kṣīṇe tatpratyayo bhavo na bhavati |
1066:151: bhave niruddhe kuto jātijarāmaraṇādikasya saṃbhava iti |
1066:153: karmakleśānāṃ tarhi kasya kṣayātparikṣaya iti vaktavyam || ucyate -
1066:156: ayoniśo hi rūpādikaṃ vikalpayato bālapṛthagjanasya kleśa upajāyate rāgādikaḥ vakṣyati hi -
1066:160: kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpātkila jāyase |
1066:161: na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi ||iti ||
1066:164: sa cāyaṃ laukikaḥ prapañco niravaśeṣa śūnyatāyāṃ sarvasvabhāvaśūnyatādarśane sati nirudhyate |
1066:166: yasmātsati hi vastunaṃ upalambhe syād yathoditaprapañcajālam |
1066:167: na hi anupalabhya vandhyāduhitaraṃ rūpalāvaṇya yauvanavatīṃ tadviṣayaṃ prapañcamavatārayanti rāgiṇaḥ |
1066:168: na ca anavatārya prapañcaṃ tadviṣayamayoniśo vikalpamavatārayanti |
1066:169: na ca anavatārya kalpanājālam ahaṃmametyabhiniveśāt satkāyadṛṣṭi mūlakān kleśagaṇānutpādayanti |
1066:170: na ca anutpādya satkāyadṛṣṭayātmakān kleśagaṇān karmāṇi śubhāśubhāniñjyāni kurvanti |
1066:171: na ca akurvāṇāḥ karmāṇi jātijarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasya [upāyāsādirūpaṃ] ekajālībhūtaṃ saṃsārakāntāramanubhavanti |
1066:172: evaṃ yogino'pi śūnyatādarśanā vasthā niravaśeṣaskandhadhātvāyatanāni svarūpato nopalabhante |
1066:173: na ca anupalabhamānā vastusvarūpaṃ tadviṣayaṃ prapañcamavatārayanti |
1066:174: na ca anavatārya tadviṣayaṃ prapañcaṃ vikalpamavatārayanti |
1066:175: na ca anavatārya vikalpam ahaṃmametyabhiniveśāt satkāyadṛṣṭimūlakaṃ kleśagaṇamutpādayanti |
1066:176: na ca anutpādya satkāyadṛṣṭayādikaṃ kleśagaṇaṃ karmāṇi kurvanti |
1066:178: tadevam aśeṣaprapañcopaśamaśivalakṣaṇāṃ śūnyatāmāgamya yasmādaśeṣakalpanājāla prapañcavigamo bhavati,
1066:185: ācāryabhāvavivekastu śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ yathoditaśūnyatādhigamamapratipadyamānaḥ evaṃ varṇayati - aparotpannapratikṣaṇavinaśvarasaṃskārakalāpamātramanātmānātmīyamavalokayataḥ āryaśrāvakasyāpi ātmātmīyavastvabhāvād dharmamātramidaṃ jāyate mriyate ceti darśanamutpadyate |
1066:188: tadabhāvādeva na kkacidādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā vastu astīti mamakārānutpatteḥ nirmamo nirahaṃkāro'hamiti na svarūpaviniścitirupajāyate,
1066:190: prāgeva ajātasarvasaṃskāradarśināṃ nirvikalpaprajñācāravihāriṇāṃ mahābodhiṃsattvānāmiti | ata āha -
1066:191: nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaśca so'pi na vidyate ||iti ||
1066:192: tadayamācāryo yathaivaṃvidhe viṣaye nācāryapādamatānuvartī tathā pratipāditaṃ madhyamakāvatāre -
1066:197: pratyeka bodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena subhūte asyāmeva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam |
1066:198: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena asyāmeva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyamityādi ||
1066:202: imu kṣānti nāgatya na śakyati pāpuṇotuṃ
1066:207: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet |
1066:208: ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍitaḥ ||
1066:209: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet |
1066:210: ātmā hi ātmanaḥ sākṣī kṛtasyāpakṛtasya ca ||
1066:219: nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ | iti ?
1066:220: tathā hi - rūpaṃ nātmā rūpavānnāpi cātmā rūpe nātmā nātmani rūpaṃ ||
1066:222: vijñānavānnātmā vijñāne nātmā nātmani vijñānam iti |
1066:229: atra cāyamabhiprāyaḥ - iha ye [ātmābhāvaviparyāsa] kudarśanadhanatimirapaṭalāvacchāditāśeṣa buddhinayanatayā laukikāvadātadarśanaviṣayānatikrāntamapi bhāvajātamapaśyanto vyavahārasatyāvasthitā eva santaḥ kṣitisalilajvalanapavanābhidhānatattvamātrānuvarṇanaparā mūlaudanodakakiṇvādidravya viśeṣaparipākamātrapratyayotpannamadamurcchādisāmarthyaviśeṣānugatamadyapānopalambhavat kalalādimahābhūta paripākamātrasaṃbhūtā eva buddhīranuvarṇayantaḥ pūrvāntāparāntāpavādapravṛttāḥ santaḥ paralokamātmānaṃ cāpavadante - nāstyayaṃ lokaḥ,
1066:234: teṣāṃ tadasadṛṣṭinivṛttyartha caturaśīticittacaritasahasrabhedabhinnasya sattvadhātoryathāśayānuvartakairaśeṣasattvadhātūttāraṇākṣipta pratijñāsaṃpādanatatparaiḥ prajñopāyamahākaruṇāsaṃbhārapuraḥ sarairnirupamairekajagadbandhubhirniravaśeṣakleśamahāvyādhi cikitsakairmahāvaidyarājabhūtairhīnamadhyotkṛṣṭavineyajanānujidhṛkṣayā hīrnānāṃ vineyānāmakuśalakarma kāriṇāmakuśalādi nivartayituṃ buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ kkacidātmetyapi prajñapitaṃ loke vyavasthāpitam |
1066:237: madhyamakāvatārācca vistareṇa veditavyeti tatpratiṣedhārtha neha punaryatna āsthīyate ||
1066:238: ye tu sadbhūtātmadṛṣṭikaṭhinātidīrghaśithilamahāsūtrabaddhā vihaṃgamā iva sudūramapi gatāḥ kuśala karmakāriṇo'kuśalakarmapathavyāvṛttā api na śaknuvanti traidhātukabhavopapattimativāhya śivamajaramamaraṇaṃ nirvāṇapuramabhigantum,
1066:239: teṣāṃ madhyānāṃ vineyānāṃ satkāyadarśanābhiniveśaśithilīkaraṇāya nirvāṇābhilāṣasaṃjananārthaṃ buddhairbhagavadbhirvineyajanānugrahacikīrṣubhiranātmetyapi deśitam ||
1066:240: ye tu pūrvābhyāsaviśeṣānugatagambhīradharmādhimokṣalabdhabījaparipākāḥ pratyāsannavartini nirvāṇe teṣāmutkṛṣṭānāṃ vineyānāṃ vigatātmasnehānāṃ paramagambhīramaunīndrapravacanārthatattvāvagāhana samarthānāmadhimuktiviśeṣamavadhārya -
1066:251: kāśyapa madhyamā pratipada dharmāṇāṃ bhūtapratyavekṣā iti ||
1066:255: dṛṣṭaśrutādyaṃ muninā na satyaṃ na mṛṣoditam |
1066:257: yataścaivaṃ hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭavineyajanāśayanānātvena ātmānātmatadubhayapratiṣedhena buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā pravṛttā,
1066:261: sarvasya vāraṇaṃ paścādyo jānīte sa buddhimān || iti ||
1066:269: athavā - ayamanyo'rthaḥ - ātmetyapi prajñapitaṃ sāṃkhyādibhiḥ pratikṣaṇavinaśvarāṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ karmaphalasaṃbandhābhāvamutprekṣya |
1066:270: anātmetyapi prajñapitaṃ lokāyatikaiḥ upapattyā ātmānaṃ saṃsartāramapaśyadbhiḥ -
1066:273: ityādinā | taimirikopalabdhakeśamaśakādiṣviva vitaimirikairiva bālajanaparikalpitātmānātmādi vastusvarūpaṃ sarvathaivāpaśyadbhiḥ -
1066:276: atha khalu śāntamatirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - upaśama upaśama iti bhagavannucyate,
1066:288: ucchedaśāśvatadṛṣṭayupaśama iti satkāyadṛṣṭayupaśamasyaitadadhivacanam iti śāntamate ye kecidārambaṇahetudṛṣṭisaṃyuktāḥ saṃkleśāḥ pravartante,
1066:293: tadyathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūle chinne sarvaśākhāpatraphalāni śuṣyanti,
1066:298: bhagavānāha- ātmāsamutthānaṃ śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā sattvāsamutthānaṃ jivāsamutthānaṃ pudgalāsamutthānaṃ dṛṣṭayasamutthānaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā na khalu punaḥ śāntamate sā dṛṣṭiradhyātmaṃ pratiṣṭhitā,
1066:306: satkāya iti śāntamate śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājātānutpādadṛṣṭayā tāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ nodgṛhṇāti,
1066:309: na kasati na vikasati na cinoti nopacinoti,
1066:312: tanna parikalpitaṃ na parikalpyate na vikalpyate,
1066:324: tatra śāntamate upāyakuśalo'yaṃ bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāpariśuddhaḥ ālambanasamatāṃ ca prajānāti,
1066:347: yasmādanutpannāniruddhā nirvāṇamiva dharmatā dharmasvabhāvaḥ dharmaprakṛtiḥ vyavasthāpitā,
1066:356: athavā | ayamanyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ - yaduktaṃ prapañcaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ nirudhyate iti,
1066:357: kathaṃ punaḥ prapañcasya śūnyatāyāṃ nirodha iti ? ucyate |
1066:359: athavā yadetaduktaṃ prāgādhyātmikabāhyavastvanupalambhena adhyātmaṃ bahiśca yaḥ sarvadā ahaṃkāramamakāraparikṣayaḥ,
1066:365: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra tattve nivṛttamabhidhātavyaṃ nivṛtte cittagocare ityāha -
1066:369: yāṃ ca śāntamate rātriṃ tathāgato'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
1066:371: asminnantare tathāgatena ekākṣaramapi nodāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhariṣyati |
1066:372: kathaṃ tarhi bhagavatā sakalasurāsuranarakiṃnarasiddhavidyādharoragaprabhṛtivineyajanebhyo vividhaprakārebhyo dharmadeśanā deśitā?
1066:373: ekakṣaṇavāgudāhāreṇaiva tattajjanamanastamoharaṇī bahuvidhabuddhinalinīvanavibodhinī jarāmaraṇasaritsāgarocchoṣiṇī kalpakālānalasaptārkaraśmivisarahrepiṇī śaradaruṇamahāprabheti ||
1066:376: na cātra vādakaḥ kaścinniścarantyatha ca svarāḥ ||
1066:379: pratiśrutkādayaḥ śabdā nādhyātmaṃ na bahiḥ sthitāḥ |
1066:380: vāgapyevaṃ narendrasya nādhyātmaṃ na bahiḥ sthitāḥ ||iti |
1066:382: devata codani dundubhi divya karmavipāka nivṛtta marūṇaṃ |
1066:383: deva pamattavihāriṇa ñātvā dundubhighoṣa pamuñci nabhāto ||
1066:384: sarva anitya aśāśvata kāmā itvara adhruva phenasabhāvāḥ |
1066:386: dundubhi vādita śakramarudbhiḥ sārddhaya saṃkrami dharmasabhāyām |
1066:387: dharmakathāṃ pakaroti marūṇāṃ yā katha śānta virāganukūlā ||
1066:394: sarve hyabhāvā na hi kaści bhāvaḥ |
1066:399: ekasvarā tu tava lokahito nānādhimukti svaru niścarati |
1066:400: ekaikamanvimamabhāṣi jino brūhi smitaṃ prakṛtakasya kṛte ||iti ||
1066:402: yasmāt kuśalākuśalaṃ karma kartāraṃ ca phalaṃ ca sarvaṃ ca lokaṃ bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyamiti bruvate |
1066:406: kutaḥ? pratītyasamutpādavādino hi mādhyamikāḥ hetupratyayān prāpya pratītya samutpannatvāt sarvameva ihalokaparalokaṃ niḥsvabhāvaṃ varṇayanti |
1066:407: yathā svarūpavādino naiva nāstikāḥ pratītyasamutpannatvād bhāvasvabhāvaśunyatvena na paralokādyabhāvaṃ pratipannāḥ |
1066:408: kiṃ tarhi aihalaukikaṃ vastujātamupalabhya svabhāvataḥ tasya paralokādihāgamanam,
1066:410: tathāpi vastusvarūpeṇa avidyamānasyaiva te nāstitvaṃ pratipannāḥ ityamunā tāvaddarśanena sāmyamastīti cet, na hi |
1066:415: yathā hi kṛtacaurya puruṣamekaḥ samyagaparijñāyaiva tadamitrapreritaḥ taṃ mithyā vyācaṣṭe cauryamanena kṛtamiti,
1066:420: ekaśca ayaśasā ca apuṇyena ca samyak parīkṣyamāṇo yujyate nāparaḥ,
1066:421: evamihāpi yathāvadviditavastusvarūpāṇāṃ mādhyamikānāṃ bruvatāmavagacchatāṃ ca vastusvarūpābhede'pi yathāvadaviditavastusvarūpairnāstikaiḥ saha jñānābhidhānayornāsti sāmyam |
1066:422: yathaiva hi upekṣāsāmānye'pi apratisaṃkhyāya pratisaṃkhyāya upekṣakayoriva pṛthagjanārhatoḥ jātyandhacakṣuṣmatośca viṣamaprapātapradeśaviniścitasāmānye'pi yathāsti mahān viśeṣaḥ,
1066:423: tathā nāstikānāṃ mādhyamikānāṃ ca viśeṣo bhaviṣyatīti pūrvācāryāḥ |
1066:428: tathāpi naivāsau adeśyamānā śakyā janairvijñātumiti avaśyaṃ tasyāmavatāraṇārthaṃ vineyajanānāṃ saṃvṛtisatyāpekṣayā kadāciddeśanānupūrvyā bhavitavyam,
1066:431: iyamatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tattvāmṛtāvatāradeśanānupūrvī vijñeyā, yaduta -
1066:432: sarvaṃ tathyaṃ na vā tathyaṃ tathyaṃ cātathyameva ca |
1066:436: na hi pratihataḥ pātraṃ saddharmasya kathaṃcana ||iti |
1066:445: nānyayā bhāṣayā mlecchaḥ śakyo grāhayituṃ yathā |
1066:446: na laukikamṛte lokaḥ śakyo grāhayituṃ tathā ||
1066:447: ityādita eva tāvadbhagavatā svaprasiddhapadārthamedasvarūpavibhāgaśravaṇasaṃjātābhilāṣasya vineyajanasya yadetat skandhadhātvāyatanādikamavidyātaimirikaiḥ satyataḥ parikalpitamupalabdham,
1066:451: yaḥ evaṃ bhavāgraparyantasya vāyumaṇḍalāde rākāśadhātuparyavasānasya bhājanalokasya sattvalokasya ca aviparītaṃ sthityutpādapralayādikaṃ sātivicitraprabhedaṃ sahetukaṃ saphalaṃ sāsvādaṃ sādīnavaṃ copadiṣṭavāniti |
1066:452: tadevaṃ bhagavati utpanna sarvajñabuddhivineyajanasya uttarakālaṃ tadeva sarvaṃ na vā tathyamityupadeśitam |
1066:453: tatra tathyaṃ nāma yasya anyathātvaṃ nāsti |
1066:458: keṣāṃcit sarvametat tathyaṃ ca atathyaṃ ceti deśitam |
1066:462: keṣāṃcittu aticirābhyastatattvadarśanānāṃ kiṃcinmātrānutkhātāvaraṇatarūmūlānāṃ naivātathyaṃ naiva tathyaṃtaditi deśitam |
1066:463: tasyāpi kiṃcinmātrasyāvaraṇasya prahāṇārthaṃ vandhyāsutasya avadāta śyāmatāpratiṣedhavadubhayametat pratiṣiddham ||
1066:464: etacca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmanuśāsanam - unmārgādapanīya samyaṅmārgapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ śāsanam |
1066:467: sarvāścaitā deśanā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākaruṇopāyajñānavatāṃ tattvāmṛtāvatāropāyatvena vyavasthitāḥ |
1066:469: vyādhyanurūpabhaiṣajyopasaṃhāravat te vineyajanānujighṛkṣayā yathānurūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti |
1066:474: kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ punaḥ tat tattvaṃ yasyaitā deśanā avatārārthamupadiśante bhagavantaḥ ?
1066:480: tathāpi vyavahārasatyānurodhena laukikatathyādyabhyupagamavat tasyāpi samāropato lakṣaṇamucyatāmiti | taducyate -
1066:486: yathā hi taimirikā vitathaṃ keśamaśakamakṣikādirūpaṃ paśyanto vitimiropadeśenāpi na śaknuvanti keśānāṃ yathāvadavasthitaṃ svarūpamadarśananyāyena adhigantavyamataimirikā ivādhigantum,
1066:488: yadā tu timiropadhātya viparītaśūnyatādarśanāñjanāñjitabuddhinayanāḥ santaḥ samutpannatattvajñānā bhavanti,
1066:490: evamaparapratyayaṃ bhāvānāṃ yat svarūpaṃ tat tattvam |
1066:509: mañjuśrīrāha - yatsamā devaputra paramārthatastathatā dharmadhātuḥ atyantājātiśca,
1066:519: yatsamaḥ paramārthataḥ saṃkleśaḥ tatsamaṃ paramārthato vyavadānam,
1066:520: yatsamaṃ paramārthato vyavadānaṃ tatsamāḥ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāḥ |
1066:521: evaṃ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmasamatāprayukto devaputra bhikṣuḥ samyakprayukta ityucyate ||
1066:522: devaputra āha - katamayā punarmañjuśrīḥ samatayā yāvat paramārthato yatsamaṃ vyavadānaṃ tatsamāḥ sarvadharmāḥ paramārthata iti?
1066:523: mañjuśrīrāha - paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpādasamatayā paramārthataḥ sarva dharmātyantājātisamatayā paramārthataḥ samāḥ sarvadharmāḥ |
1066:525: paramārthato nirvāṇā nānākaraṇā hi devaputra sarvadharmā atyantanirutpādatāmupādāya |
1066:543: pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat |
1066:546: tadyathā śālibījaṃ pratītya pṛthivyādisāmagrīṃ ca śālyaṅkura upajāyate,
1066:547: na hi tāvat tadeva taditi śakyate vaktum |
1066:548: naiva yadeva bījaṃ sa eva aṅkuraḥ,
1066:556: evaṃ tāvad yadeva bījaṃ sa eva aṅkuraḥ iti na yujyate |
1066:563: yataścaivaṃ yat kāraṇaṃ pratītya yat kāryamutpadyate,
1066:566: tasmānna kāraṇamucchinnaṃ nāpi śāśvatamiti śakyate vyavasthāpayitum |
1066:571: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa caiva aṅkuro |
1066:572: na ca anyu tato na caiva tadevamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā ||
1066:577: mahākaruṇopāyamahāmeghapaṭalanirantarāvacchāditākāśadhātuparyantadiṅmaṇḍalānāṃ rāgādikleśagaṇasamudācārātitīkṣṇatarādityamaṇḍalopatāpitajagajjātijarāmaraṇaduḥkhadahanasaṃtāpopaśamatatparāṇāṃ satatāviratayathānurūpacaritapratipakṣasaddharmadeśanāmṛtadhārāpātaiḥ yathānurūpavineyajanakuśalamūlaśasyau - ṣadhiphalaphullalatotpannātivṛddhayanujidhṛkṣūṇāṃ saddharmāmṛtamahāvarṣavarṣiṇāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamahānāgānāmatrāṇālaukikatrāṇānāmanāthanāthānāṃ sakalalokanāthānāmetat tatsaddharmāmṛtaṃ sakalatraidhātukabhavaduḥkhakṣaya svabhāvaṃ yathopavarṇitena nyāyena ekatvānyatvarahitaṃ śāśvatocchedavādavigataṃ ca vijñeyam |
1066:578: etaddharmatattvāmṛta pratipannānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ śrutacintābhāvanākramāt pravartamānānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñātmakaskandhatrayāmṛta rasasya upayogānniyatameva jarāmaraṇakṣayasvabhāvanirvāṇādhigamo bhavati |
1066:579: athāpi kathaṃcidiha aparipakka kuśalamūlatayā śrutvāpyetat saddharmāmṛtam,
1066:581: tathāpi janmāntare'pi avaśyameṣāṃ pūrvahetubalādeva niyatā siddhiḥ saṃpadyate |
1066:593: tasmādasaṃsargāddhetoḥ pratyekabuddhā nāmasaṃbuddhake'pi kāle yasmādbhavatyeva dharmatattvādhigamaḥ,
1066:594: tasmādabandhyā siddhirasya saṃbuddhamahāvaidyarāja praṇītasya saddharmatattvāmṛtabhaiṣajyasyeti vijñeyam |
1066:596: ato'rhati prājñaḥ prāṇānapi parityajya saddharmatattvaṃ paryeṣitumiti |
1066:598: kathaṃ ca bhagavan sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā?
1066:599: evamukto bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena kāye'narthikena jīvitanirapekṣeṇa lābhasatkāraślokeṣvaniśritena paryeṣamāṇena paryeṣitā |
1066:600: tena prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena araṇyagatena antarīkṣānnirghoṣaḥ śruto'bhūt - gaccha kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi |
1066:602: tathā ca gaccha yathā na kāyaklamathamanasikāramutpādayasi,
1066:605: yāvat mā kkaciccittaṃ praṇidhā adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā |
1066:613: tathā ca kulaputra gaccha yathā [nātmato] na satkāyataścalasi na rūpato na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārebhyo na vijñānataścalasi |
1066:622: yāvanmāreṇa pāpīyasā udake'ntardhāpite athāsyaitadabhūt - yannvahamātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhā ime pṛthivīpradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyam |
1066:625: mā rajodhāturito dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śarīre nipatet |
1066:627: varaṃ khalu punarmama evaṃrūpayā kriyayā ātmabhāvasya vināśaḥ kṛto bhavet,
1066:629: bahūni ca mama ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bhinnāni punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ,
1066:631: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā samantādātmānaṃ viddhā samantatastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svakena rudhireṇāsiñcadityādi ||
1066:632: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahadarśanādeva dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ pratyalabhata - tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣorekāgramanasikārasya bhikṣoḥ |
1066:633: tatreyaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitādeśanā yaduta sarvadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamatā,
